nodes.bodyText: Does BallerinaTypeCheck fit into natives.io? Cant it be considered part of core?

nodes.bodyText: This is too much to be effective shall we use 80 which is usually the default character width of a terminal. Or we can do 180 as per https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Characters_per_line
